mdRecord.dcterms:title: Orchards, exterior
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Lutyens, Edwin (English architect, 1869-1944) [work]
Wilson, Richard Guy [photographer]
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Orchards was the first in a series of successful designs by Lutyens for Arts and Crafts style country houses, larger than Munstead Wood but similarly using local styles of vernacular architecture. These included Goddards and Tigbourne Court in Surrey, Deanery Garden in Berkshire and Little Thakeham in Sussex. This series of designs established Lutyens's reputation. -- http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orchards,_Surrey [work]
